00026 typedef unsigned  XiDWord;
00027 typedef XiDWord   XiBool;  //NB: always pass as 0 or 1, and always test against 0 (to allow future extensions)
00028 
00029 
00030 typedef XiDWord XiStateFlags;
00031 enum {
00032    // the state of the trocar and instrument
00033    XI_TrocarIsPresent     = 1<< 0, 
00034    XI_TrocarHasHaptics    = 1<< 1, 
00035    XI_TrocarIsInitialized = 1<< 2, 
00036    XI_ToolIsConnected_OLD = 1<< 3, 
00037    XI_ToolIsInserted      = 1<< 4, 
00038 
00039    // primarily for troubleshooting/testing purposes, not to be relied on in end-user applications
00040    XI_TrocarHasFFBPower   = 1<< 6, 
00041    XI_TrocarHasFFBEnabled = 1<< 7, 
00042 
00043    // instrument buttons or footswitch
00044    XI_ToolButtonMain      = 1<< 8, 
00045    XI_ToolButtonLeft      = 1<< 9, 
00046    XI_ToolButtonRight     = 1<<10, 
00047 
00048    // flags used to indicate why a tool has not been initialized yet (when XI_TrocarIsInitialized is not set)
00049    XI_InitNeedToolOut     = 1<<16, 
00050    XI_InitNeedLeftIPulse  = 1<<17, 
00051    XI_InitNeedRightIPulse = 1<<18, 
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 enum { // Tool identifiers
00056    XI_ToolIDDisconnected   = 0,    
00057    XI_ToolIDHandle         = 1,    
00058    XI_ToolIDReversedHandle = 2,    
00059    XI_ToolIDCamera         = 3     
00060 };

00063 typedef struct XiToolState_
00064 {
00065    XiStateFlags flags;        
00066    float       trocarDir[3];  
00067    float       toolDepth;     
00068    float       toolRoll;      
00069    float       opening;       
00070    XiDWord     toolID;        
00071 } XiToolState;

00075 typedef struct XiToolForce_
00076 {
00077    float tipForce[3];   
00078    float rollForce;     
00079    float opening;       
00080 } XiToolForce;

00155 /*
00156 
00157      SAMPLE CODE FOR USING XiTrocarInterface.h
00158      =========================================
00159 
00160 The general structure of application code may follow:
00161 
00162    xiSoftwareVendor("<YourVendorKey>");
00163 
00164    int numRobots = xiTrocarAcquire();
00165    if( numRobots <= 0 ) { _report_device_not_present_error_to_user_and_exit_(); }
00166 
00167    for(;;) // repeat during iterations of the simulation model
00168    {
00169       xiTrocarQueryStates();
00170 
00171       for( int robot=0 ; robot<numRobots ; ++robot )   //for each device
00172       {
00173          XiToolState state;
00174          xiTrocarGetState(robot,&state);
00175          // ... use the position information to update the simulation ...
00176 
00177          XiToolForce force = {0};
00178          // ... fill in the force fields as calculated by the simulation model ...
00179          xiTrocarSetForce(robot,&force);
00180       }
00181 
00182       xiTrocarFlushForces();
00183    }
00184 
00185    xiTrocarRelease();  // to free all resources and close the commuication ports
00186 */
